title: Odile Renaud-Basso | German Marshall Fund of the United States
snippet: Odile Renaud-Basso was elected the seventh president of EBRD on 2 November 2020 by the EBRD’s Board of Governors.She is the first-ever female head of a multilateral development bank.

title: EBRD President Odile Renaud-Basso
snippet: Odile Renaud-Basso is the President of the EBRD, an office she has held since 2020.

title: President Odile Renaud-Basso
snippet: Odile Renaud-Basso is the President of the EBRD, an office she has held since 2020.

title: OFFICIAL USE OFFICIAL USE Odile RENAUD BASSO Nationality: French
snippet: Committee, G7 and G20 deputy, alternate governor of the World Bank, EBRD, AfDB, IDB, AIIB, AsDB, and Chairman of the Paris Club. Member of Thales’ Board of Directors.

title: Odile Renaud-Basso assumes office as EBRD president
snippet: Odile Renaud-Basso assumed office as the new president of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) in London today.
